about_the_game:
Three of the most interesting figures in French history can join your game as Agitators, exclusive to owners of the Victoria 3 Expansion Pass and Victoria 3 Grand Edition, as well as those who pre-ordered Victoria 3: Voice of the People.

* Alexis de Tocqueville: traveller, political philosopher and advocate for liberal democracy, he pushed against monarchies and for greater popular power.
* Georges Clemenceau: the great political figure of the Third Republic, Clemenceau led France through major crises, including World War I.
* Jules Brunet: Military advisor to the Japanese Shogunate, he joined the defense of the old regime against the Meiji Reforms.
detailed_description:
Three of the most interesting figures in French history can join your game as Agitators, exclusive to owners of the Victoria 3 Expansion Pass and Victoria 3 Grand Edition, as well as those who pre-ordered Victoria 3: Voice of the People.

* Alexis de Tocqueville: traveller, political philosopher and advocate for liberal democracy, he pushed against monarchies and for greater popular power.
* Georges Clemenceau: the great political figure of the Third Republic, Clemenceau led France through major crises, including World War I.
* Jules Brunet: Military advisor to the Japanese Shogunate, he joined the defense of the old regime against the Meiji Reforms.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-3250 or AMD® FX 8370 (AVX support required)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 660 (2GB) or AMD® R7 370 (2GB) or Intel® HD Graphics 630 or AMD Radeon™ Vega 8
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6600K or AMD® Ryzen 5 2600X (AVX support required)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 1660 (6GB) or AMD® RX 590 (8GB)
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Catalina (Mac OS 10.15)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD® Radeon™ R9 M380 (2GB)
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Monterey (Mac OS 12)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-7700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD® Radeon™ Pro 580 (8GB)
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

name: Victoria 3: French Agitators Bonus Pack

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 660 (2GB) or AMD® R7 370 (2GB) or Intel® HD Graphics 630 or AMD Radeon™ Vega 8

  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6600K or AMD® Ryzen 5 2600X (AVX support required)Intel® Core™ i5-6600K or AMD® Ryzen 5 2600X (AVX support required)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 1660 (6GB) or AMD® RX 590 (8GB)
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
